casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tae Kwon HAMMONDS. No. 389A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 29, 2016. Joseph E. Elder, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hammonds, Tae Kwon. John R. Rittelmeyer, Raleigh, for Disability Rights North Carolina, et al. Anne Bleyman, for Disability Rights North Carolina, et al. Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of April 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of April 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 6th day of May 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
